{{Dangerous version|multiple=true|edition=java|version=release|type=vulnerability|Creative mode players with modified clients can create signs that can run any command. This was fixed in [[Java Edition 1.8.6|1.8.6]].<br/>The dedicated server for this version includes a security vulnerability in the Log4j library that could be used to perform a remote code execution exploit. It can be addressed by appending a certain JVM argument to the server startup command line.<ref name="article_log4shell_vulnerability">{{Mcnet|important-message--security-vulnerability-java-edition|Important Message: Security vulnerability in Java Edition|December 10, 2021}}</ref>}}

'''1.8.5'''<ref name="blogpost">{{cite|url=https://www.mojang.com/2015/05/minecraft-1-8-5-security-release/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2015/05/minecraft-1-8-5-security-release/|title=Minecraft 1.8.5 Security Release|author=Searge|website=Mojang.com|date=May 22, 2015}}</ref> is a minor update to {{JE}} which was released on May 22, 2015 to fix a security related issue, a scoreboard related issue and some changes to splashes.<ref>{{tweet|SeargeDP|601446274798223362|We'll release Minecraft 1.8.5 in the morning to address a security related issue and a scoreboard issue. Thanks, @CrushedPixel for your help|May 21, 2015}}</ref><ref>{{tweet|CrushedPixel|601131990902054914}}</ref> 1.8.5 is compatible with [[Java Edition 1.8|1.8]] – [[Java Edition 1.8.4|1.8.4]] servers.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Splash]]es'''
* Added "GNU Terry Pratchett".

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Splash]]es'''
* Removed the following splashes:
** "Happy birthday Notch!"
** "Happy Birthday ez!"
** "Notch <3 ez!"
* Changed "Cooler than Spock!" to "Not as cool as Spock!"

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.8.5|prefix=Minecraft
|;From 1.8
|50550|Stacked boats floating.
|;From 1.8.4
|79632|Phantom custom player in scoreboard/UUIDs of non-player entities on scoreboards truncated after relog.
|;Private issues
|80478|Better server validation for movement packets.<ref name="blogpost"/>
|80479|Invalid beacon effects are not validated.<ref name="blogpost"/>
|80480|Certain attribute values are not bound.<ref name="blogpost"/>
}}</onlyinclude>
